usage: A chest for players to store and take treasures
interactivity: its hinged lid could be opened
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the treasure chest and use their hands to make contact with the lid. The interaction will likely involve a pressing motion to push the lid open, utilizing a sustained contact method with the palms or fingers. The chest's wooden texture will provide a tactile feedback as users touch it, and the hinged lid will respond by swinging open, allowing access to the treasures inside.

usage: players will use it to open a tresure chest
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the key using a precision grip, holding it between their thumb and index finger. The interaction will involve a turning motion as they insert the key into the lock of the treasure chest. The smooth texture of the key will provide a pleasant tactile sensation, and users may feel a slight resistance when turning the key, simulating the locking mechanism's engagement.

usage: players will use it to smash things
inertia: relatively heavy with the center of mass concentrated at one end
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the hammer using a power grip, wrapping their hand around the round handle. The interaction will involve lifting the hammer and swinging it downwards to smash objects. The relatively heavy weight, with the center of mass concentrated at one end, will provide a strong inertia sensation, making the hammer feel substantial in their hands. Users will experience a forceful impact feedback when the hammer strikes an object, simulating the expected haptic response.

usage: players will punch it for blowing off steam
outline: the punching bag is positioned on the ground. make sure a proxy's volume covers this punching bag
hardness: feeling a little bit soft while punching
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the scarecrow punching bag and use their fists to make contact with it. The interaction will involve a striking motion, where users will punch the bag to release tension. The punching bag will feel soft upon impact, providing a slight give, which will enhance the experience of blowing off steam. Users may also engage in sustained contact by pushing against the bag, feeling its volume and softness as they interact with it.
